Text.Name: Wall
Text.Desc: A basic structure which can be used to create a closed room. The room must be within 3-400 grids.

Text.Name: Barrier2
Text.Desc: A simple stone or metal railing used to separate different areas. Cannot form a room.

Text.Name: Barrier
Text.Desc: A simple wooden railing used to separate different areas. Cannot form a room.

Text.Name: Door
Text.Desc: A basic structure used to enter or exit a room. \n(Connecting doors facing the same direction will be viewed as one door.)

Text.Name: Door_SpringFestival
Text.Desc: A basic structure used to enter or exit a room. The character for fortune has been added to the door for good luck. \n(Connecting doors facing the same direction will be viewed as one door.)

Text.Name: Door_WanYao
Text.Desc: A basic structure used to enter or exit a room. It is carved with the head of a beast, adding some ominous vibe to it. \n(Connecting doors facing the same direction will be viewed as one door.)

Text.Name: Firecracker
Text.Desc: It can bring people joy. Once ignited, all other fireworks within three grids will be lit. It is said that something magical will happen when 9 fireworks are lit at the same time under a starry sky.
